sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT FECHA_MODIFICACION FROM Par.Control_Tabla WHERE NOMBRE_TABLA = '@{pipeline().parameters.Tabla}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT MAX(FECHA_MOVIMIENTO) FECHA_MODIFICACION
  FROM [Fact].[VPRODUCTOS]
  WHERE CONVERT(DATE,FECHA_EXTRACCION) = (SELECT CONVERT(DATE,DATEADD(HH, -5, GETDATE())))

activities.name: Carga Archivos ADL y Tablas Azure
Carga Archivos ADL y Tablas Azure

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Full Extraer Tablas y Cargar Azure SQL_Con Excel')]

activities.name: Carga Archivos ADL y Tablas Azure

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RecibeIntAsString as string,
	RecibeFloatAsString as string,
	RecibeDateAsString as string,
	RecibeArrayAsString as string,
	RecibeArrayElementAsString as string,
	RecibeBoolAsString as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(RecibeIntAsString = toInteger($RecibeIntAsString),
		RecibeFloatAsString = toFloat($RecibeFloatAsString),
		RecibeDateAsString = toDate($RecibeDateAsString),
		RecibeArrayAsString = $RecibeArrayAsString,
		RecibeArrayElementAsString = $RecibeArrayElementAsString,
		RecibeBoolAsString = toBoolean($RecibeBoolAsString)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Variables.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	dateFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd',
	timestampFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	Categoria as string
}
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
LecturaADL filter(ProductCategoryID==toInteger($Categoria)) ~> FilterCategoria
FilterCategoria sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	Campo as string,
	Fecha as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	Campo as string,
	Fecha as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
LecturaADL filter(toTimestamp(byName($Campo))>= toTimestamp($Fecha)) ~> Campo
Campo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	Fecha as string
}
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
LecturaADL filter(ModifiedDate==toTimestamp($Fecha)) ~> FilterCategoria
FilterCategoria sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
